nodes.documentation:
@dev Initialize events ImageCreated,ImageDeleted and imageTipped
to use in the front end what is happening on the blockchain when a transaction has been confirmed.
nodes.name: ImageCreated

nodes.documentation: @dev Check wether we can continue execution by evaluating the ContractIsActive ie isActive is true or not.
nodes.name: contractIsActive

nodes.documentation: @dev OnlyOwner controls the Circuitbreaker switch between isActive and notActive.
nodes.name: toggleCircuitBreaker

nodes.documentation: @dev Stops the contract execution forever and returns funds to the owner.
nodes.name: close

nodes.documentation: @dev Upload Images to IPFS only when required conditions are fulfilled.
nodes.name: uploadImage

nodes.documentation: @dev  Tip Image Owner only when certain requirements are met
nodes.name: tipImageOwner

to use in the front end what is happening on the blockchain when a transaction has been confirmed.

nodes.name: toggleCircuitBreaker

close().details: Stops the contract execution forever and returns funds to the owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call (`onlyOwner`) functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

tipImageOwner(uint256).details: Tip Image Owner only when certain requirements are met

toggleCircuitBreaker().details: OnlyOwner controls the Circuitbreaker switch between isActive and notActive.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account newOwner. Can only be called by the current owner.

uploadImage(string,string).details: Upload Images to IPFS only when required conditions are fulfilled.
